column2: name=El Señor de los Anillos, Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)

column1: '''El Señor de los Anillos, Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)''' was a Spanish Text-Adventure covering book I of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/anillos.html El Señor de los Anillos, Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 8 January 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 8 January 2011)</ref> The game has both music and illustrations,<ref name="El Anillo"/> but most are taken from other games<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> mostly from [[Interplay Productions
column2: Interplay]]'s [[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I (1990 video game)
column3: The Lord of the Rings, Vol. I]] and [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Defender_of_the_Crown Defender of the Crown].<ref name="El Anillo"/> The author of the game is [[Dimas Caparrós Gómez]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/>
